subject: Baseball
World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: In 23 seasons, Pedro Valdes, 39, has played for 18 teams, in 13 leagues and in five countries. Now with Puerto Rico, Valdes plans to retire after the World Baseball Classic.
snippet: In 23 seasons, Pedro Valdes, 39, has played for 18 teams, in 13 leagues and in five countries. Now with Puerto Rico, Valdes plans to retire after the World Baseball Classic.
